live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
27624.summary: Some customers in the King Edward area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27624.title: Oct 20 – Winnipeg (King Edward) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
